whistling_bungholes.name: Whistling Bunghole
whistling_bungholes.description: What's up? A dozen shots of triple stage whistling silver crackling comets, that's what!

spleen_splitters.name: Spleen Splitter
spleen_splitters.description: Reloadable artillery shell, great height and triple break, spectacular bursts.

whisker_biscuit.name: Whisker Biscuit
whisker_biscuit.description: Shoots sprays of silvery showers with a loud whistle.

honkey_lighter.name: Honkey Lighter
honkey_lighter.description: Oh, beautiful these Patriot skies! Let your patriotism ring out at the twilight's last gleaming when you stand and salute these 12 shots of true America color: red, white, and blue stars with red tails.

husker_do.name: Husker Do
husker_do.description: Aerial multi-colored smoke rises high for a daytime show in the sky.

husker_donts.name: Husker Don't
husker_donts.description: Multi-color smoke stays low allowing for a quick, stealthy get away.

nipsy_daises.name: Nipsy Daiser with Scooter Stick
nipsy_daises.description: Replenish your senses and fire up your electrical impulse with hot blue sparks, silver flower, sparks, and titanium crackles.

cherry_bombs.name: Cherry Bomb
cherry_bombs.description: Don't forget to add some smoke to your show! These smoke balls can be used during day or night, emitting colorful smoke and thick fog.

whistling_kitty_chasers.name: Whistling Kitty Chaser
whistling_kitty_chasers.description: Loud! Long-lasting whistle with brilliant gold and silver spray.
